channel.title: Comments on: A Fresh and New Beginning

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: Sure, Ben, no problem. It is a work in progress though; I have over 100 webpages to transfer book titles, authors, publisher to Excel. Currently the best list is gobooks dot info.
item.content:encoded: Sure, Ben, no problem. It is a work in progress though; I have over 100 webpages to transfer book titles, authors, publisher to Excel. Currently the best list is gobooks dot info.

item.title: By: Ruben Berenguel
item.dc:creator: Ruben Berenguel
item.description: Ben, I've been playing go (not continuously, sure) for, like, 11 years already. I'd love to be 6d and crushing it, but my life took other detours. I'll eventually improve, it takes a while. Also: I used to write a lot in my blog (not about go, about other things) but eventually realised it was far better to write when I wanted to *really* write and "do things" instead of just writing. Writing is good, but it's not doing the stuff you write about, if you understand what I mean. So, take it easy, you still have 8.5 years to catch me ;)
item.content:encoded:
Ben, I’ve been playing go (not continuously, sure) for, like, 11 years already. I’d love to be 6d and crushing it, but my life took other detours. I’ll eventually improve, it takes a while.
Also: I used to write a lot in my blog (not about go, about other things) but eventually realised it was far better to write when I wanted to *really* write and “do things” instead of just writing. Writing is good, but it’s not doing the stuff you write about, if you understand what I mean.
So, take it easy, you still have 8.5 years to catch me üòâ

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. You're a funny one. Oo! If you don't mind, I would love to get a copy of that when you're since it would be great to get an idea the level of efforts I need to put forth to have a comprehensive review of the go books on the blog!
item.content:encoded:
Haha. You’re a funny one.
Oo! If you don’t mind, I would love to get a copy of that when you’re since it would be great to get an idea the level of efforts I need to put forth to have a comprehensive review of the go books on the blog!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: I will write "Shodan at Any Age" and dedicate to the Master - BenGoZen! I am compiling an updated Go Books in English...appears to be about 600 of them - compared to 15,000 or so on chess. :(
item.content:encoded:
I will write “Shodan at Any Age” and dedicate to the Master – BenGoZen!
I am compiling an updated Go Books in English…appears to be about 600 of them – compared to 15,000 or so on chess. üôÅ

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Whoa! I never knew that book existed! You'll have to let me know what you think of it! In terms of endgame, I think that Western literature is a bit lacking. Maybe you'll become an expert and write your own someday!
item.content:encoded:
Whoa! I never knew that book existed! You’ll have to let me know what you think of it!
In terms of endgame, I think that Western literature is a bit lacking. Maybe you’ll become an expert and write your own someday!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: I have at least designed my first Learning Module. I will do visualization exercises with a PowerPoint I built, similar to one I used for chess. Also, I will be going through the Ishi Elementary book on Endgames (your are correct, Chapter One is fierce!) and the Basic Endgame tutorial on Sensei's. I also bought Mathematical Go Endgames but its mostly a math book, not really what I seek - some basic local situation Go 'algorithms.'
item.content:encoded:
I have at least designed my first Learning Module. I will do visualization exercises with a PowerPoint I built, similar to one I used for chess. Also, I will be going through the Ishi Elementary book on Endgames (your are correct, Chapter One is fierce!) and the Basic Endgame tutorial on Sensei’s.
I also bought Mathematical Go Endgames but its mostly a math book, not really what I seek – some basic local situation Go ‘algorithms.’

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. You are too humble! Shodan is not impossible Molokai. I assure you it is not! Ganbatte Molokai! Ganbatte!
item.content:encoded: Haha. You are too humble! Shodan is not impossible Molokai. I assure you it is not! Ganbatte Molokai! Ganbatte!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: Well, you can stay until I make shodan. A guarantee the blog will run 100 years! :) Keep on keeping on, Ben.
item.content:encoded: Well, you can stay until I make shodan. A guarantee the blog will run 100 years! üôÇ Keep on keeping on, Ben.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Well I imagine you'll get past it soon, so that means I can leave soon right? (Just kidding!)
item.content:encoded: Haha. Well I imagine you’ll get past it soon, so that means I can leave soon right? (Just kidding!)

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: You can't leave until I am at least under 10K, Ben! :)
item.content:encoded: You can’t leave until I am at least under 10K, Ben! üôÇ
